trans-unit.source: The <see cref="N:System.Windows.Forms.Layout" /> namespace contains classes for implementing layout behaviors in your form or control.
trans-unit.target: Lo spazio dei nomi <see cref="N:System.Windows.Forms.Layout" /> contiene classi per l'implementazione dei comportamenti di layout in un form o in un controllo.

trans-unit.source: The following list shows the classes included in this namespace:
trans-unit.target: L'elenco seguente mostra le classi incluse in questo spazio dei nomi:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine> abstract base class is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel> controls for building custom layout engines.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine> classe base astratta viene utilizzato il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel> controlli per la compilazione di motori di layout personalizzato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.ArrangedElementCollection> class collects objects that participate in a layout managed by a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.ArrangedElementCollection> classe raccoglie gli oggetti che fanno parte di un layout gestito da un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine>.
